name: Mittens
description:
Solo submission for Brackeys Game Jam 2022 - You're not alone.

Game

You crash landed your ship on a strange unknown planet, and have been asked to help with the ongoing invasion. To increase your health, you can pray to Mittens and when you acquire enough faith, your health will increase.

WASD to move, mouse to shoot. Press E when at a Mittens statue to pray (cat statue). Open the end temple by using E. 

There is a slight problem with the player getting stuck in the ground sometimes, if this happens either jump or walk backwards. 

I was unable to finish the game, as I spent way too much time on the art. For that reason, there is a lot of audio missing that I would have liked to include, and many background objects in the scene to make it feel more alive. 

Music sourced from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/

"Land of 8 Bits" by Stephen Bennett

"A Bit Of Hope" by David Fesliyan

Sound Effects from Freesound.org

LittleRobotSoundFactory https://freesound.org/s/270327/ and https://freesound.org/s/270325/
